Starting the Virutal Record

Nov 19, 2025

The virtual record will be where I keep records of “digital things”. I believe that memories form in the digital realm is just as important, through it is highly likely this will include records of video games and intresting memories.

A summary of the expected post can be expected

Journey: Basically a fan fiction story written based on a actual co op game. I am basically retelling the tale like a fanfiction.

Thoughts: A review on my thoughts of a particular game or media at a point of time
